 and several sailing vessels

sgcool_label_text:Henricus Hondius\u0027s 1636 map of Southeast Asia was based on Willem Blaeu\u0027s map from the previous year. Both maps were vast improvements from earlier maps of the region
 and present the extent of the trading influence of the Dutch East India Company. This map features a dedication in Latin to the wealthy Dutch merchant Christophoro Thisio.

metadata.sgcool_label_text: Henricus Hondius's 1636 map of Southeast Asia was based on Willem Blaeu's map from the previous year. Both maps were vast improvements from earlier maps of the region, and present the extent of the trading influence of the Dutch East India Company. This map features a dedication in Latin to the wealthy Dutch merchant Christophoro Thisio.
